2_1HVJvkzPdXDEtsjBSzFLyx6KsG8Tg2nnr5.body: if it's installed correctly you should have a file like 'tor.service' in /etc/systemd/system . If that is the case, then all you need do is: sudo systemctl enable tor.service . If not, you need to create the service file.

1_1EwCeJE1k48nqMFtAuiEPLUzNeKvCGTmtX.body: There is no inherent reason that a decentralized service could not be ad supported in the same manner as any other web based service.
